          <title>
            <string language="en">Global temperature of the Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Globale Temperatur der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La température globale de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Temperatura global da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Temperatura globale della terra</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Temperatura global de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the changes in the global temperature of the Earth over the last 120 years.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>

            <string language="en">Earth</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt die Änderungen in der
globalen Temperatur der Masse über den letzten 120 Jahren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne montre les changements de la 
température globale de la terre au cours des 120 dernières années.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra as mudanças na 
temperatura global da terra sobre os últimos 120 anos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra i cambiamenti nella
temperatura globale della terra durante gli ultimi 120 anni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει τις 
αλλαγές στη σφαιρική θερμοκρασία της γης κατά τη διάρκεια των 
τελευταίων 120 ετών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra los cambios en la
